Text: I have stopped seeding this one. Want it seeded again just leave message and al turn it back on.
Also those who have fully downloaded the game seed back! I do not appreciate leechers that do not share back!
I should elaborate, it's called nipie2.exe from National Instruments. Coming from you
I'm getting a National Instruments virus from this torrent

Sorry, the virus is not from you.

And sorry for 4 comments!

It turns out it was my utorrent program..

Sorry again!

The game runs well (I did not install DX and C++, and did not run the .reg file) but it does not have hi-res (more than 1024x768) menu, it changes the resolution of the game but not of the menu (it makes it smaller). The menu is when you start the game (New game, continue, options, extras, exit game etc.) and ingame when you hit the ESC key. Maybe it is just me, maybe it's the torrent. Who cares when I can play!
Just follow the instructions on the readme and you're good to go. Shouldn't have any problems.
